Texts.Chs:
疯狂科学的产物，似乎由仍然活着的大脑的样本来供能。
^orange;逐渐苏醒，其中的意识决定产出。^reset;
最大功率^orange;60W^reset;。
^blue;左侧输入^reset;：电源开关
Texts.Eng: A product of mad science that appears to run from cannisters of still-living brains. ^orange;Gradually wakes up, consciousness determines output.^reset; Maximum power ^orange;60W^reset;. ^blue;Left Input^reset;: On/Off Switch
